name: Idiopathic Pulmonary Hemosiderosis
chief_complaint: I keep coughing up blood and feel short of breath all the time
treatment: possible lung transplant in advanced cases
prognosis: Variable; may progress to respiratory failure without treatment, but some patients respond well to immunosuppressive therapy
description: A rare condition characterized by recurrent diffuse alveolar hemorrhage leading to pulmonary hemosiderin deposition, iron deficiency anemia, and progressive lung damage. Etiology remains unknown, though autoimmune mechanisms are suspected. Most common in children but can occur in adults.
